metadata.title: Sushi SaaS
metadata.description: Launch-ready SaaS starter with modern tooling and clean design.
metadata.keywords: saas template, next.js starter, better auth

hero.title: Ship your SaaS faster
hero.subtitle: Kickstart your product with a production-ready template, multilingual landing page, and authentication powered by Better Auth.

items.title: International ready
items.description: Serve global customers from day one with localized content and routing.

items.title: Better Auth integration
items.description: Modern authentication primitives you can extend with email, social, or passkeys.

items.title: Health monitoring
items.description: Simple heartbeat endpoint ensures deployments stay observable.

landing.footer: Crafted in Next.js 15 with Tailwind CSS and Better Auth.
